org.apache.juneau.internal

Class ThrowableUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.internal.ThrowableUtils

  • public class ThrowableUtils
extends Object
    Various utility methods for creating and working with throwables.

    • Constructor Summary

      ThrowableUtils()

      Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the specified object is null.

      Throws an exception if the specified thread ID is not the same as the current thread.

                                 String msg,
                                 Object... args)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the specified object is null.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to check.
        msg - The message of the IllegalArgumentException.
        args - Optional MessageFormat-style arguments.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Constructed exception.

                                      String fieldName)

        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the specified field is null.
        Parameters:

        fieldName - The name of the field.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Constructed exception.

        Parameters:

      • assertSameThread

        public static void assertSameThread(long threadId,
                                    String msg,
                                    Object... args)
                             throws IllegalStateException
        Throws an exception if the specified thread ID is not the same as the current thread.
        Parameters:
        threadId - The ID of the thread to compare against.
        msg - The message of the IllegalStateException.
        args - Optional MessageFormat-style arguments.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Constructed exception.

      • assertExceptionContainsMessage

        public static void assertExceptionContainsMessage(Throwable t,
                                                  String msg)
                                           throws AssertionError
        Throws an assertion error if the specified throwable or throwable causes do not contain the specified message string.
        Parameters:
        t - The throwable to check.
        msg - The message text to check for.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - Assertion failed.

      • getCause

        public static <T extends Throwable> T getCause(Class<T> c,
                                               Throwable t)
        Same as Throwable.getCause() but searches the throwable chain for an exception of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The throwable type to search for.
        Parameters:
        c - The throwable type to search for.
        t - The throwable to search.
        Returns:
        The exception, or null if not found.

      • throwException

        public static void throwException(String name,
                                  String message,
                                  Class<?>... throwables)
                           throws Throwable
        Given a list of available throwable types, attempts to create and throw the exception based on name.
        Parameters:
        name - The exception name. Can be a simple name or fully-qualified.
        message - The exception message passed to the exception constructor.
        throwables - The list of available throwable classes to choose from.
        Throws:
        Throwable - The thrown exception if it was possible to create.
